subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In the their 121-96 victory over Phoenix, Amar’e Stoudemire, Mike D’Antoni and the Knicks showed that they are transforming from a work in progress to one that opponents heed with caution.
snippet: In the their 121-96 victory over Phoenix, Amar’e Stoudemire, Mike D’Antoni and the Knicks showed that they are transforming from a work in progress to one that opponents heed with caution.
